definition: to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: There is no mandatory paid annual leave in the U.S.
sentences.chinese: 美國沒有強制帶薪年假。

sentences.english: He had already taken a one-year 1999 sabbatical.
sentences.chinese: 他於是在1999年帶薪離職一年。

sentences.english: Labourers who have worked for one successive year or more shall be entitled to an annual vacation with pay.
sentences.chinese: 勞動者連續工作一年以上的，享受帶薪年休假。

sentences.english: "Workers paid annual leave regulations" promulgated at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 《職工帶薪年休假條例》同時出臺。

sentences.english: That compares with 20 in the U.K. and 10 in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 英國和日本的帶薪年假分別是20天和10天。

sentences.english: Most Americans get only two weeks of paid vacation a year.
sentences.chinese: 多數美國人一年只有兩週帶薪的假期。

sentences.english: They enjoy a 30 -day pay holiday every year .
sentences.chinese: 他們每年可享受30天的帶薪假期。

sentences.english: Men are allowed two weeks of paternity leave, on statutory pay.
sentences.chinese: 而男性的法定帶薪休假僅有2周。
我當然希望能夠帶薪休假。

sentences.english: Workers band together to get paid holidays.
sentences.chinese: 工人們聯合起來爭取帶薪休假。

sentences.english: After seven years on staff, they qualify for paid eight-week sabbaticals.
sentences.chinese: 在公司工作七年後，她們有資歷獲患上八週帶薪歇假。

sentences.english: Per cent of them are gainfully employed elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 他們中有52%的人在地方有帶薪工作。

sentences.english: Within 3 hours, my father had 12 weeks of paid vacation.
sentences.chinese: 3小時內，爸爸獲得了12周的帶薪假期。

sentences.english: Whether the FIEs can make unified arrangement of the employee Paid Annual Leave or not?
sentences.chinese: 企業是否可以統一安排員工休帶薪年休假？

sentences.english: Equal pay for equal work, paid leave, raising the minimum wage.
sentences.chinese: 平等同工同酬，帶薪休假，提高最低工資標準。

sentences.english: And you will receive two weeks-paid vacation a year, as well.
sentences.chinese: 此外你還可以有每年兩週的帶薪假期。
